moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 h6: I'm not sure I like this move. It doesn't seem to accomplish much except keep my DSB off g5
moves.4. d3 d6 5. d4: I know this wasn't a great move. I probably should have moved it to d4 in the first place.
moves.5... exd4 6. Nxd4 Nxd4 7. Qxd4: A few exchanges. I have a slight lead in development and control more of the center.
moves.8... Ng4 9. Bxf7+: I used to do this a lot. Now I only do it If a bishop is on g4 pinning my knight to my queen.
Hmm... Why did he do that?
moves.13. Nc3 dxe5 14. Rd1 Bd6 15. Qd3+ g6: I'm not sure I like this move. It removes defense of the h pawn, which was his undoing later.
moves.16. Qd2: If I can just get his knight to move...
moves.16... Rg8: I really don't like this move. I would have moved my king to g8.
moves.17. h3: Now black is in some trouble
moves.17... Nf6: He should have moved his king to g7 and let the knight get taken
moves.18. Qxh6#: And I get a lucky win. Please comment If you see a better move somewhere
